Configuration.HelipadParameters: This Param must be measured in the real Helipad. It represents the total height The units are not important, just keep in mind you must use the same ones you are going to use in all the measurements. 96 Total width 91 The height of the black line under the "H" 10 The width of the other black line 11 Height of the white square 76 Width of the white square 69 Height of the white "line" under the "H" 15 Width of the other white "line" 16 Width of the "H" 36 Width of the H's vertical lines 4 used for the threshold step 0 Size of the columns and rows of the Cannonical Marker Image 364 Size of the columns and rows of the Cannonical Marker Image 384 Used to identify candidate markers 0.04 Used to identify candidate markers 0.5 Used to remove too near marker candidates. 10 Size of the Helipad 0.096 0.091
Configuration.ThresHoldParameters: Params for the threshold 7 this one is only used in the adaptative threshold. 7 Methods: · 1 -> Normal Threshold (Not Recomended) · 2 -> Adaptative Threshold (Recomended) · 3 -> Canny 2
